== System cpu and memory statistics ==
sar 1 10 -r -u

== Process statistics ==
pidstat -C BK_SLM -rud -h 10

== lsof ==

== strace ==
sudo strace -fp 812 -s120 -o /tmp/strace.txt         - get trace of all system calls of process
